entry.title: New release for Postiz: New Modal Creation Dialog
entry.content:
I'm super excited about this feature; it was the most significant technical debt of Postiz. - Removed the "edit" only this, it is now just a new tab with an edit button. - Move everything to a global state with Zustand. - Validation works 10x better - Removed the weird "useValues"; it is now working with useImperativeHandle.

We are having office hours tomorrow (25.6.2025) on Discord, about everything, including the new modal editor. Please join (and test it before ðŸ˜‰)
